template.name: How to migrate from Odoo online to Odoo SH

div.h1: Odoo SaaS to Odoo.sh Migration : Enhance ERP Customization and Performance
div.p: migrate your Odoo SaaS instance to Odoo.sh with our comprehensive migration service.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

div.p: Odoo is growing day by day and enhancing new features and releasing new updates every year.So you can utilize these new features with your business and speed up your business operation sand increase your productivity.

If you are using odoo online(SaaS), It has limitations in customisation, on saas you can customize your erp with odoo studio only. If you need a highly customized ERP system to fit your specific business needs, odoo.sh or on-premise Odoo is the way to go.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

img.alt: How to migrate from Odoo online to Odoo SH
img.title: How to migrate from Odoo online to Odoo SH

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 align-self-center

div.p: Odoo provides majorly two versions of erp one is community and another is enterprise. In enterprise edition there are two types one is odoo.sh which is completely PaaS edition and another is Odoo SaaS edition. Odoo SaaS is a complete solution from odoo, which is hosted on odoo server, on this platform you may not be able to use customized third party modules. Only run erp with the odoo standard modules.

div.h2:
Manage your instrument academy with ease!
Get started today with our all-in-one system

a.class: btn rippler rippler-default sh_call_to_action_btn btn-1 mx-4

div.p: Odoo.sh is a platform as a service, which means odoo provides a platform where you can customize odoo erp as per your requirements with odoo standard. Here are the some features about the odoo.sh

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12
col-xxl-12 col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: You can install certified apps from Odoo and even third-party apps to tailor Odoo to your specific needs.

div.class: col-xxl-12 col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box sh_mb_1

div.p: It offers features like Github integration, online code editor, and continuous integration tools to help you develop custom functionalities.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 d-none d-lg-none d-xl-block d-xxl-block

img.alt: What is Odoo.sh - Cloud platform for hosting Odoo ERP
img.title: What is Odoo.sh - Cloud platform for hosting Odoo ERP

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-6 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12
col-xxl-12 col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box

div.p: It provides separate development, staging, and production environments for testing and deployment.

div.class: col-xxl-12 col-xl-12 col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12 sh_key_feature_main_box sh_mb_1 sh_mb_0

div.p: Odoo.sh takes care of server management, backups, and infrastructure, allowing you to focus on using Odoo.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 mx-auto d-block col-md-12 col-12

div.p: You'll get a confirmation email from us soon, letting you know we've received your request and started working on it.
Our solution advisor will review your needs and get back to you within 2 business days.
If needed, we can sign a mutual NDA within 1 business day to keep everything confidential.
Our business development manager will share an initial project estimate or recommendations within 2-4 days.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 col-12

div.p: Odoo SaaS to odoo on premise migration is the crucial process. Don’t worry, with softhealer you can achieve it very smoothly and very precisely without loosing a single data. We are experts in odoo since odoo was known as a tiny erp. Our team is highly qualified and certified by odoo officials.
